course_title: Pediatric Acute Care NP Practicum IV
class_notes: Online synchronous sessions via Zoom. Face-to-face intensives dates: TBD
course_description: This course further integrates the care of children that are acutely ill or chronically ill. Emphasis is on leadership and creation of care delivery material in an acute care setting.
prerequisites: NRSG 815D and NRSG 816D as prerequisites, NRSG 817D as co-requisite, or equivalent transfer credit.
sections: Class Nbr: 1581, Section #: 1, Type: CLN, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: M. Terry, Status: Open
